title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.15 - Disabled, abandoned and illegally parked vehicles subject to removal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.15 - Disabled, abandoned and illegally parked vehicles subject to removal

State Regulations

The manager may remove from any area of the air terminal
any vehicle which is disabled, abandoned, parked in violation of the rules and
regulations set forth in this Subchapter, or which presents an operational
problem to any other area at the air terminal at the operator's expense and
without liability for damage which may result in the course of such
moving. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1274.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
